name: Outcast (itch) (ddeathw1sh)
description:
You're trapped in a crashed spaceship and your life is ticking so you need to get out ALIVE. You will find color-coded keys to find the engine activator key to get out of the spaceship. You can collect health packs to replenish your health. 

It is my first developed game in Unreal Engine 4 and partial fulfillment for my EMC Elective 1 subject. I made the level design and the mechanics of the game via Blueprint, a visual scripting system in Unreal Engine.
